attributes.action: Review the unfair apprentice wage structure which causes the use of cheap labour
attributes.additional_details: Because apprentices are being used as a means of cheap labour by many companies in the uk
attributes.background: Put apprentices on the same minimum pay rate as the rest of the population to stop the use of apprenticeships as cheap labour rates

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want a review of apprentice pay or for it to be equalised to the National Living Wage.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
